bio: Javascript is one of the greatest languages to get your teeth stuck into. I'll be on hand to help guide anyone on a quest to tame the JS beast!

bio: I'm a career changer (used to be a telecommunication Engineer), always up for learning new things and helping along the way.

name: Makan Taghizadeh
bio: I've developed JavaScript professionally for years and I believe JavaScript is the most flexible programming language on the planet. From backend (Node.js) to frontend (React.js, Angular, Vue.js, ...) to mobile devices (React Native, Native Script, ...), you can develop for so many parallel universes with JavaScript.
